patthana21.40:1.1: Naappaccayaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.40:2.1: Naappaccayaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.40:3.1: (Naappaccayanaanidassanaappaṭighamūlepi ekameva.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
